room_title: Escape room "Outbreak: Find the Cure" by Mastermind Escape Games in Atlanta
review: Just completed Outbreak with a group of 9 and had a complete blast! Really creative puzzles that utilized everyone's strengths and a very unique hint system. We made it out with time to spare!

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak: Find the Cure" by Mastermind Escape Games in Atlanta
review: A groups of us (4 people) went to do Outbreak + 2 more strangers joined. 6 to 8 people, I think, is optimal for the room. More - would be too busy/crowded. We did not escape but had lot's of fun.

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak: Find the Cure" by Mastermind Escape Games in Atlanta
review: I had an absolutely amazing time with my team at Mastermind Escape! Thanks for the experience and genuine service.

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak: Find the Cure" by Mastermind Escape Games in Atlanta
review: Had a blast tonight escaping from the Outbreak room! Definitely challenging but we got it done with some time to spare. Go and check them out!
